component.name: ColorSmith
component.summary: Professional color picker, gradient maker, and palette manager

description.p: ColorSmith is a professional color management suite designed for designers, developers, and digital artists. It delivers precision tools for color selection, accessibility testing, gradient creation, and palette management with an intuitive interface built for professional workflows.

ul.li: WCAG AA/AAA compliant contrast checker for accessible design
Visual HSL gradient sliders for intuitive color adjustments
Smart paste detection that automatically converts color codes between formats
Enhanced color preview with hover-to-enlarge functionality
Original color comparison to track color modifications
Context menu operations on palette swatches for streamlined workflow
Screen color picker to capture colors from anywhere on your display
Interactive HSV color plane with precision brightness adjustment slider
Support for multiple color formats: HEX, RGB, RGBA, HSL, HSLA, HSV, and CMYK
Transparency control with alpha channel support
Random color generator for creative inspiration
One-click color value copying to clipboard
Customizable resizable layout with persistent panel sizing
Create linear and radial gradients with unlimited stops
Precise control over gradient angles (0-360Â°) and stop positions
Live preview with fullscreen mode support
Export as CSS code (with vendor prefixes and old WebKit syntax)
Export as SVG files or PNG images with custom dimensions
Random gradient generation
Screen color picker integration for gradient stops
Create and manage multiple custom color palettes
Extract color palettes from images using K-means clustering
Import and export palettes in JSON format
Add optional names to palette colors for better organization
Built-in standard HTML colors palette
Quick add current color to any palette
Right-click context menu to copy or remove colors
Comprehensive keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+K to view all shortcuts)
Persistent settings that remember window geometry, panel sizes, and last used color
Clean, modern Qt-based interface with streamlined toolbar
Quick access to project documentation and source code
